Overrides:

Parameters:
command - A String containing the command to be executed.

leftSquare

public boolean leftSquare()
Makes the SquareRobot move in a left square. A left square is defined as three spaces forward, a left turn, three spaces, a left turn, three spaces, a left turn, three spaces and a left turn. The robot should end up facing the same direction as he started. If the robot is unable to complete the entire movement it should return to the original position facing the original direction.

Returns:
true if the robot was able to complete the Left Square movement, false otherwise

rightSquare

public boolean rightSquare()
Makes the SquareRobot move in a right square. A right square is defined as three spaces forward, a right turn, three spaces, a right turn, three spaces, a right turn, three spaces and a right turn. The robot should end up facing the same direction as he started. If the robot is unable to complete the entire movement it should return to the original position facing the original direction.

Returns:
true if the robot was able to complete the Right Square movement, false otherwise
